issue.title: [C++] Investigate new S3 CRT client in AWS SDK
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14561](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14561). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See the explanations given upstream in https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-cpp/wiki/Improving-S3-Throughput-with-AWS-SDK-for-CPP-v1.9#working-with-the-new-s3-crt-client

The S3 CRT client might improve performance on transfers, and might also simplify dependencies (since AFAIU it doesn't use libcurl). Though that remains to be validated.
